page.title: 12A Day In The Life Of-----
page.content: I am 11 years' old. I get up at 7.15am and get ready for the day.After breakfast and feeding the guinea pigs, we cycle to school arriving at 8.45am. Before morning break at 10.30am, we do Maths and English and then carry on or change subjects until midday.At 1.00pm we start afternoon lessons-music,games or art.I go home at 3.15pm.After school I play with my friend or watch television.I am in bed at 9.00pm and asleep by 10.00pm. <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> I am a mother.I get up first about 7 o'clock. The family has breakfast together, and then I drive the children to school. On returning home with the youngest child,I begin the day's chores -which include laundry, gardening, shopping, and preparing the evening meal. In the evening, we watch some televiion and play a game
